Name: Minor Enhancement
Lore: Your weapon has been blessed, increasing the damage it deals.

Name: Minor Enrichment
Lore: Your weapon has been blessed, inflicting poison on your enemies.

Name: Minor Blessing of Deathblow
Lore: Blessed by the priest, your strikes are now able to bring a more painful death on your enemies.

Name: Blessing of the Desolation
Lore: Your recent encounter in the Pyramid of Truth has left you feeling stronger, able to obliterate foes with much less effort.

Name: Blessing of the Damned
Lore: You have been infused by death itself, granting you the power you cause fatal damage to all foes around.
